resources.string:
Cadpage Paging Service is now supported!!!
 See http://www.cadpage.org/paging-service
 
 Back key will be disabled when call detail screen is still waiting for user acknowledgement. Hopefully this will stop cases where call detail screen was accidentally cleared and an old call accidentally selected while groping for phone.
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Oroville, CA
 Morgan County, AL
 Adams County, CO
 Citrus County, FL
 Licking County, OH
 Sedwick County, KS
 Oldham County, KY
 Lafayette County, LA
 Ossage County, MO
 Monmouth County, NJ
 Madison COunty, NY
 Summit County, OH
 York County, SC
 Sevier County, TN
 Bell County, TX
 Preston County, WV
 
 Automatically decode base64 encoded alert messages
